bitfield.description: Height in pixels of the in the input image to be scaled, minus 1
Width in pixels of in the input image that is to be scaled, minus 1.
When set the input image will be pre-processed using a bilinear filter to effectively half the image size in the vertical direction.
Input Scaler vertical pitch:
When set the input image will be pre-processed using a bilinear filter to effectively half the image size in the horizontal direction.
Input Scaler horizontal pitch:
Input_Scaler horizontal crop:
Input_Scaler vertical crop:

register.description: Scaler control

bitfield.description: Scaler enable flag: 0 scaler is disabled, 1 scaler is enabled.
Input frame store format, where the bits
Pixel component resolution to encode
Chroma resolution of 'input scaler' output

register.description: For each of the source planes A, B and C, these fields define the contribution to the 3 output planes in the colour space conversion process.

bitfield.description: Scaling factor applied to modified source pixel component contributing to luma output plane [although colour space conversion may not be to YCbCr] [signed fixed point 2.10]
This field defines any modification to source pixel component prior to scaling

register.description: For each of the source planes A, B and C, these fields define the contribution to the 3 output planes in the colour space conversion process.

bitfield.description: Scaling factor applied to modified source pixel component contributing to Cr output plane [although colour space conversion may not be to YCbCr] [signed fixed point 2.10]
Scaling factor applied to modified source pixel component contributing to Cb output plane [although colour space conversion may not be to YCbCr] [signed fixed point 2.10]

register.description: For each of the source planes A, B and C, these fields define the contribution to the 3 output planes in the colour space conversion process.

register.description: The first register defines the modification and clipping applied to the luma output plane, and the second register defines the modification and clipping applied to both the Cb and Cr output planes.

bitfield.description: This field defines any modification to source pixel component prior to scaling
